title: Why does Janna get a free pass for being the most OP champion in the game?
body:
jesus fucking christ its actually annoying.

{{champion:7}} : goes above 46% win rate for once
community outrage, all her abilities get nerfed at least twice 

{{champion:40}} : 57% win rate for months and has never been seen below 54% win rate
nah shes fine cause she doesnt kill people!! XDDD
